ipAddress.title: IP Address
ipAddress.description: The device's IP address. It is recommended to set a static IP for this device.

token.title: Local Token
token.description: The token of the device. This can be found in the Bond app in your Bond Settings.

fullSetup.title: Full Setup
fullSetup.description: Include a Fan/SpeedControl and a Light/Dimmer, otherwise a Light Dimmer only.

timerSetup.title: Include Timers
timerSetup.description: Include a Fan timer and a Light timer, otherwise no timers.

debug.title: Enable detailed debug log
debug.description: Enables a detailed debug log. Useful when trying to figure out issues with the plugin.
